## correspondence.Api.letter() method

Opens pre-populated letter window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
letter(request: LetterRequest): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [LetterRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.correspondence.letterrequest.md) | the create request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```

 // Specify the fields here.
};
// Opens pre-populated email window.
sdk.correspondence.letter(request);
```
